name: Yeet of the Ox
description:
Synopsis

The Ox wants to escape from their abusive owners, the Farmers.

Find other stranded Ox to become STRONGER TOGETHER as a herd.

The bigger the herd, the more success you will have in ramming through destructible obstacles.

How To Play

Press the key "A" to move left.
Press the key "D" to move right.
Avoid falling into the water or GAME-OVER.
Save other Ox to destroy bigger obstacles.
If your herd can not destroy the obstacle, then GAME-OVER.

Made by QuackenBear

Elliott Adams
Van Quach
Panda Xu
